noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 492-2018 to designate 350 and 352 Adelaide Street West and 118 Peter Street (Trinity-Spadina, Ward 20) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: TE27.20 - Alterations to Designated Heritage Properties, Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act and Authority to Enter into a Heritage Easement Agreement - 350 and 352 Adelaide Street West and 118 Peter Street
By-law 492-2018 - To designate the properties at 350 and 352 Adelaide Street West and 118 Peter Street as being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act  R.S.O. 1990, Chapter 0.18 and  City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-law - 350 and 352 Adelaide Street West and 118 Peter Street
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
